alert.note: Alert for Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 1:35PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect far northern Aroostook County... At 134 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was over Frenchville, or near Madawaska...moving southeast AT 15 MPH. Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Van Buren, Frenchville, Lille, Cross Lake, Grand Isle, Hamlin and Saint Agatha. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Van Buren and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 near Fort Kent. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
